update co_shipping_order
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
notify_party = #{notifyParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where shipping_order_id = #{shippingOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update co_shipping_order set order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipper = #{shipper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notify_party = #{notifyParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lc_no = #{lcNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port_of_loading = #{portOfLoading,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port_of_trans = #{portOfTrans,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port_of_dischar = #{portOfDischar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loading_date = #{loadingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, limit_date = #{limitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_batch = #{isBatch,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_trans = #{isTrans,jdbcType=CHAR}, copy_num = #{copyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, special_condition = #{specialCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, freight = #{freight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_by = #{checkBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_dept = #{createDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shipping_money = #{shippingMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where shipping_order_id = #{shippingOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT co_shipping_order.`shipping_order_id`, co_shipping_order.`order_type`,co_shipping_order.`shipper`,co_shipping_order.`consignee`, co_shipping_order.`notify_party`,co_shipping_order.`lc_no`,co_shipping_order.`port_of_loading`,co_shipping_order.`port_of_trans`, co_shipping_order.`port_of_dischar`,co_shipping_order.`is_batch`,co_shipping_order.`is_trans`,co_shipping_order.`remark`,co_shipping_order.`state` FROM co_shipping_order WHERE shipping_order_id = #{shippingOrderId}
